articles.content:

articles.title: Wandering elephant herd may be heading home after yearlong China trek - New York Post
articles.description: The 14 Asian elephants, including three calves, were spotted on Sunday heading across a bridge in China’s southwestern Yunnan province.
articles.content:
A herd of wild elephants that captivated the world with their yearlong trek through China — raiding farms and even a retirement home for food along the way — may finally be heading back home.
